title: Enhancing Nursing Practice Competencies: Adaptive Language Training Development Structure Based on the Mastery Model

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and understanding of job-related technical terminology
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can appropriately use job-related language expressions in context with 85% or higher accuracy when meeting mastery criteria.
Learners utilize a real-time feedback system to correct and improve individual weaknesses within three attempts.
Learners perform complex language tasks (oral communication/document writing) with 90% completion accuracy through project-based assessments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
